amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for environmental mitigation by $3 million and increases funds for the Air and Marine Interdiction account by $624,000, for the purpose of recapitalizing the Border Patrol's airplane fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for border security fencing, infrastructure, and technology by $3 million and increase funds for air and marine interdiction, operations, maintenance, and procurement by $624,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 186 (Roll no. 353).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 186 (Roll no. 353).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
